name: Dragon Mountain Double Feature
description:
Two games in one!

Play as a young girl trying to fight off the nightmares in "Ghost House," or as a reprobate who really needs to go in "Turd Burglar."  What you do in the first may change the second.

Move with arrow keys.  "Z" and "X" for actions.

Finished project, but currently a "soft launch."  Stay tuned for a downloadable ROM file.

More information coming soon at https://dragonmountaindesign.com
